entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then flurries beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
